edu.sysu.lhfcws.mailplus.commons.util

类 ThreadMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.sysu.lhfcws.mailplus.commons.util.ThreadMonitor

  • public class ThreadMonitor
extends Object
    Only for monitoring persistent thread. Do not register a non-persistent thread.
    作者:
    lhfcws
